About Us

  • Registered LLC in Indiana (Sustainable Data Centers, LLC)
  • Operate out of Colostore (1/4th rack)
  • Est. Feburary 2013

Our Offers

  • Included daily offsite backups
  • IPv6 upon request (ticket) (tunneled)
  • Self-Managed/Un-managed
  • Choice of Debian, Ubuntu, CentOS, Fedora, SuSE and more
  • Enterprise (Supermicro, Intel Xeon, LSI MegaRaid) hardware
  • OpenVZ-based
